title: Empire of the Ants - Digital Deluxe Upgrade
description: Experience Empire of the Ants like never before with the Digital Deluxe Edition. This exclusive package offers players a deeper dive into the world of ants with a digital artbook, stunning HD wallpapers, and an immersive soundtrack.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
**THE ART OF: EMPIRE OF THE ANTS — OFFICIAL ARTBOOK**
Dive into the creative process behind *Empire of the Ants* with a comprehensive digital artbook. Discover concept art, character designs, and the intricate details that bring this microscopic world to life.

Content includes:
- Concept art
- Early sketches
- Character and environment designs
- Behind-the-scenes stories
- Notes from the Dev Team

**ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK**
From epic battles to symphonic journey: Mathieu Alvado and Mark Choi unite for an original soundtrack in *Empire of the Ants*. Mathieu Alvado, a multi-award-winning composer, has worked in the movie and gaming industries for more than 15 years. He has overseen the orchestration and recording for feature films (*The Three Musketeers, Beauty and the Beast, and The Connection*) and major video game projects (including *Rayman Origins, Rayman Legends*, and various Ubisoft and Google IPs).

Mark Choi, a pianist from the Royal Academy of Music and an award-winning composer, specializes in video game music and has created numerous acclaimed scores (*Baldur's Gate 3 Official Piano Arrangement, Princess Mononoke, and Romeo & Juliet* for the theatrical adaptations).

**4K WALLPAPER IMAGES** 
Enhance your desktop with exclusive HD and 4K wallpaper images, featuring stunning visuals from *Empire of the Ants*. These wallpapers capture the beauty and intricacy of the ant world.
